channel.title: Mohave County|Arizona|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Mohave County|Arizona|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Kingman Wash Access Road at US-93 North
item.description: Kingman Wash Access Road at US-93 North to Las Vegas (Nevada) and Hoover Dam.

item.title: US-93 South - Exit 2 Offramp at Kingman Wash Road
item.description: US-93 South - Exit 2 offramp at Kingman Wash Road. Turn left for Kingman Wash, Hoover Dam, and Las Vegas (NV). Turn right for Kingman (via US-93 south). Access to Hoover Dam involves crossing back into Nevada to Exit 2, and then returning back to the dam.

item.title: US-93 South - Exit 2
item.description: US-93 south at Exit 2 - Kingman Wash Access Road. Kingman Wash Access Road is the former route of US-93 across the Hoover Dam.

item.title: US-93 South - Exit 2
item.description: US-93 south approaching Exit 2 - Kingman Wash Access Road. Kingman Wash Access Road is the former routing of US-93. The Arizona welcome sign is partially visible in the background of the photo.

item.title: I-15 South Approaching Exit 122
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 122 (Nevada) - BL-15/Pioneer Blvd/Sandhill Blvd. BL-15 is not signed on the actual interchange within Nevada.

item.title: I-15 South - Mesquite Next Three Exits
item.description: Mesquite (Nevada) Next Three Exits on I-15 south. This was taken on the Arizona side of the border.

item.title: I-15 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-15 south. Distance to Mesquite, Jct. US-93, and Las Vegas. All destinations are in Nevada. This is the last distance marker southbound on I-15 in Arizona.

item.title: I-15 South Approaching Exits 9 and 8
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 9 - Desert Springs and approaching Exit 8 - Littlefield/Beaver Dam.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 9
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 9 - Desert Springs

item.title: I-15 South - Curves/Mountain Grades
item.description: Entering Virgin River Gorge on I-15 south. Curves/Mountain Grades Next 11 Miles.

item.title: I-15 South - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome to Arizona on I-15 south at the Arizona-Utah Border. The sign reads Arizona: The Grand Canyon State Welcomes You.

item.title: I-15 South - Arizona State Line
item.description: I-15 south - Arizona State Line. Taken at the Arizona-Utah state line.

item.title: I-15 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-15 south. Distance to Littlefield, Mesquite (Nevada), Las Vegas (Nevada). This is the first distance marker southbound along I-15 in Arizona.

item.title: County Road 91 North at I-15 South
item.description: County Road 91 North at I-15 South to Las Vegas (Exit 8).

item.title: I-15 North at Exit 8 Offramp
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 8 offramp. Turn left for Beaver Dam and the Arizona DOT Littlefield shop.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 8
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 8 - Littlefield/Beaver Dam. This is the first exit on i-15 north in Arizona. The next services along I-15 are 30 miles north in St. George (Utah).

item.title: I-15 North - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome To Arizona on I-15 north at the Nevada-Arizona state line. The larger sign says Arizona: The Grand Canyon State Welcomes You. The smaller sign says Arizona State Line. The smaller sign appears on most Arizona interstates entering or leaving Arizona.

item.title: I-15 South Approaching Exit 122
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 122 (Nevada) - BL-15/Pioneer Blvd/Sandhill Blvd. BL-15 is not signed on the actual interchange within Nevada.

item.title: I-15 South - Mesquite Next Two Exits
item.description: Mesquite (Nevada) Next Two Exits on I-15 south. This was taken on the Arizona side of the border.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 8
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 8 - Littlefield/Beaver Dam.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 9
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 9 - Desert Springs. This interchange used to be labeled Farm Road.

item.title: I-15 South Approaching Exits 9 and 8
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 9 - Desert Springs and approaching Exit 8 - Littlefield/Beaver Dam.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 18
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 18 - Cedar Pocket.

item.title: I-15 South Approaching Exit 18
item.description: I-15 South approaching Exit 18. Use Exit 18 for the Virgin Canyon Recreation Area.

item.title: I-15 South - Entering Virgin River Gorge
item.description: Entering the Virgin River Gorge on I-15 south.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 27
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 27 - Black Rock Road. This is the first exit on I-15 south in Arizona.

item.title: I-15 South - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome to Arizona on I-15 south at the Arizona-Utah Border. The sign reads Arizona: The Grand Canyon State Welcomes You.

item.title: I-15 South - Arizona State Line
item.description: I-15 south at the Arizona State Line. Taken at the Arizona-Utah state line.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 1
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 1 - Golden Shores/Oatman. This is the last exit in Arizona on I-40 westbound.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 2
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 2 - Needle Mountain Road.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 9
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 9 - AZ-95 South/Lake Havasu City/Parker.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 13
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 13 - Franconia Road.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 20
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 20 - Santa Fe Ranch Road

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 25
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 25 - Alamo Road.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 26
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 26 - Proving Ground Road

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 28
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 28 - Old Trails Road.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 37
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 37 - Griffith Road.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 44
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 44 - Shinarump Drive/Oatman Hwy

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 48
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 48 - US-93/To AZ-68/Las Vegas/Beale St. US-93 north leaves I-40 westbound and turns towards Las Vegas. Eastbound, US-93 south joins I-40 through Kingman.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching Exit 48
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 48 - US-93/To AZ-68/Beale st./Las Vegas. AZ-68 leaves US-93 north of Kingman and connects to Bullhead City, Arizona and Laughlin, Nevada.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 51
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 51 - Stockton Hill Road.

item.title: End AZ-66 At I-40/US-93
item.description: End AZ-66 West at I-40/US-93 Jct. Historic Loop US-66 continues west through downtown Kingman.

item.title: End AZ-66 West At I-40/US-93
item.description: End AZ-66 west at I-40/US-93 jct. Use I-40 West/US-93 North for Los Angeles and Las Vegas. Use I-40 East/US-93 South for Phoenix and Flagstaff. Continue straight for Andy Devine Avenue and Historic Loop US-66.

item.title: I-40 West at AZ-66
item.description: I-40 west at AZ-66 (and Historic Loop US-66) at Exit 53 onramp. Use AZ-66 east for Peach Springs and Kingman Airport.

item.title: I-40 West - Exits 53 and 51
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 53 - Historic Loop US-66/AZ-66 East/Andy Devine Ave./Kingman Airport. Approaching Exit 51 - Stockton Hill Road.

item.title: For Historic US-66 Use Exit 53
item.description: For Historic US-66 to Peach Springs use Exit 53. The Arizona Scenic Byway symbol is on the top left of this sign. Historic US-66 through Arizona between Topock and Ash Fork is called the Historic Route 66 National Scenic Byway.

item.title: I-40 West - Kingman Exits
item.description: Kingman exits on I-40 west: Historic Loop US-66/AZ-66/Andy Devine Ave., Stockton Hill Road, US-93 Beale St.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching Exit 53
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 53 - Historic Loop US-66/AZ-66 East/Andy Devine Ave./Kingman Airport.

item.title: I-40 West - AZ-68 Traffic Use Exit 48
item.description: AZ-68 traffic for Bullhead City, and Laughlin (Nevada), use Exit 48. This sign is posted on the east end of Kingman approaching Exit 53.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching Exit 59
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 59 - DW Ranch Road.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching Exit 66
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 66 - Blake Ranch Road.

item.title: US-93 North at I-40
item.description: US-93 north at I-40. US-93 north joins I-40 west through Kingman.

item.title: US-93 North at I-40
item.description: US-93 north at I-40. Use I-40 West/US-93 north for Kingman/Los Angeles/Las Vegas. Use I-40 east for Flagstaff. US-93 north joins I-40 west through Kingman.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching I-40
item.description: US-93 north approaching I-40, one-half mile.

item.title: AZ-95 North CA/AZ StateLine
item.description: AZ-95 north and Arizona Welcome Sign at California border

item.title: AZ-95 North I-40 Jct.
item.description: AZ-95 north at I-40 to Bullhead City/Los Angeles and Flagstaff

item.title: AZ-95 North I-40 Jct.
item.description: AZ-95 north at I-40 west to Bullhead City and Los Angeles

item.title: Beale St. at I-40/US-93 Jct.
item.description: US-93 north to Las Vegas and Bullhead City at I-40 west to Los Angeles

item.title: Beale St. at I-40/US-93 Jct.
item.description: US-93/I-40 junction on Beale St. northbound.

item.title: Beale St. Historic US-66 Jct.
item.description: BL-40/Historic US-66 to Oatman on Beale St

item.title: Beale St. To US-93/AZ-68
item.description: To US-93/AZ-68/Las Vegas/Bullhead City on Beale St

item.title: I-40 Santa Fe Ranch Rd Entrance
item.description: Santa Fe Ranch Road at I-40 to Flagstaff and Los Angeles

item.title: I-40 Santa Fe Ranch Rd Entrance
item.description: I-40 west shield on Santa Fe Ranch Road

item.title: I-40 Santa Fe Ranch Rd Onramp
item.description: Onramp to I-40 east Flagstaff on Santa Fe Ranch Road

item.title: I-40 West Exit 1
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 1, Golden Shores/Oatman, 2 Miles

item.title: I-40 West Exit 2
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 2, Needle Mountain Road

item.title: I-40 West Exit 9
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 9, AZ-95 South/Lake Havazu CIty/Parker

item.title: I40 West Exit 13
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 13, Franconia Road

item.title: I40 West Exit 20
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 20, Santa Fe Ranch Road

item.title: I40 West Exit 25
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 25, Alamo Road, 1/4 mile

item.title: I40 West Exit 25
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 25, Alamo Road, 3/4 mile

item.title: I40 West Exit 26
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 26, Proving Ground Road, 1 Mile

item.title: I40 West Exit 26
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 26, Proving Ground Road, 1/2 mile

item.title: I40 West Exit 26
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 26, Proving Ground Road

item.title: I40 West Exit 28
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 28, Old Trails Road

item.title: I40 West Exit 37
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 37, Griffith Road

item.title: I40 West Exit 44
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 44, Oatman Hwy/Shinarump Drive

item.title: I40 West Yucca Exits
item.description: I-40 west, Yucca Exits: Proving Ground Rd/Alamo Rd

item.title: US-93 South at AZ-68
item.description: US-93 south at AZ-68 to Laughlin and Bullhead City. Commercial traffic for US-93 south exit here as well.

item.title: US-93 South at CR-125 East
item.description: CR-125 East/Chloride 1 mile, on US-93 south.

item.title: US-93 South at I-40
item.description: US-93 south at I-40 east to Flagstaff and Phoenix. Use Beale St. for Historic US-66.

item.title: AZ-389 East - Adopt A Highway and Milemarker
item.description: Adopt a Highway, state highway shield, and milemarker along AZ-398 east between Colorado City and Freedonia.

item.title: AZ-389 East - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Arizona Welcome Sign on AZ-389 East in Colorado City, Arizona. Taken at the Utah-Arizona line.

item.title: AZ-398 East - Mohave County
item.description: AZ-389 shield in rural Mohave County between Colorado City and Fredonia.

item.title: Black Rock Road at I-15
item.description: Black Rock Road at I-15 freeway entrance.

item.title: I-15 Exit 27 Interchange
item.description: I-15 Exit 27 offramp at Black Rock Road.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 8
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 8 - Littlefield/Beaver Dam.

item.title: I-15 North - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome to Arizona on I-15 north. This is also the boundary between Pacific and Mountain Time Zone, during standard time. Arizona does not observe Daylight Savings Time, so when DST is active Nevada and Arizona are on the same time.
